name: Next Sparc LLC
description: Private Equity investor in SaaS internet
overview:
Next Sparc LLC invests in emerging Internet-based, software, and services-based companies and helps them achieve significant growth.

Next Sparc is focused on acquiring growth stage companies already generating revenue and seeking an infusion of capital as well as experienced operational leadership. Ideal investment targets include technology companies developing Software as a Service (SaaS) solutions, and/or mobile and social media applications.
